# uptimekuma_notification_serverchan (Resource)

ServerChan notification resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "uptimekuma_notification_serverchan" "example" {
  name       = "ServerChan Notification"
  is_active  = true
  is_default = false

  # ServerChan send key for authentication
  # Generate this from your ServerChan account
  send_key = "SCT12345abcdef"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Notification name
- `send_key` (String, Sensitive) ServerChan send key for authentication

### Optional

- `apply_existing` (Boolean)
- `is_active` (Boolean)
- `is_default` (Boolean)

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) Notification identifier
